content.content: 1. The requisition for a drainage works referred to in subsection 3 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The requisition for a drainage works referred to in subsection 3 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The notice of the engineer’s on-site meeting to examine the area referred to in subsection 3 (7) of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The notice of the engineer’s on-site meeting to examine the area referred to in subsection 3 (7) of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 2.

content.content: 3. The petition for a drainage works referred to in subsection 4 (2) of the Act, (a) shall be in Form 3 where it is filed by a person or persons referred to in clause 4 (1) (a) or (b) of the Act; (b) shall be in Form 4 where it is filed by the Director under clause 4 (1) (d) of the Act; or (c) shall be in Form 5 where it is filed by a person referred to in clause 4 (1) (c) of the Act. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3. The petition for a drainage works referred to in subsection 4 (2) of the Act,

(a) shall be in Form 3 where it is filed by a person or persons referred to in clause 4 (1) (a) or (b) of the Act;

(b) shall be in Form 4 where it is filed by the Director under clause 4 (1) (d) of the Act; or

(c) shall be in Form 5 where it is filed by a person referred to in clause 4 (1) (c) of the Act. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 3.

content.content: 4. (1) The by-law adopting the engineer’s report referred to in subsection 45 (1) of the Act shall, (a) in the case of municipalities not within district or regional municipalities, be in Form 6; and (b) in the case of municipalities within district or regional municipalities, be in Form 7. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 4 (1). (2) The borrowing by-law for use by district or regional municipalities on behalf of an area municipality shall be in Form 8. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 4 (2).
content.raw_html:
4. (1) The by-law adopting the engineer’s report referred to in subsection 45 (1) of the Act shall,

(a) in the case of municipalities not within district or regional municipalities, be in Form 6; and

(b) in the case of municipalities within district or regional municipalities, be in Form 7. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 4 (1).

(2) The borrowing by-law for use by district or regional municipalities on behalf of an area municipality shall be in Form 8. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 4 (2).

content.content: 5. The statement of the amount of compensation paid referred to in section 68 of the Act shall be in Form 9. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 5. FORM 1   REQUISITION FOR DRAINAGE WORKS Drainage Act   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, Form 1. FORM 2   NOTICE OF APPOINTMENT FOR EXAMINATION BY ENGINEER Drainage Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, Form 2. FORM 3   PETITION FOR DRAINAGE WORKS Drainage Act   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, Form 3. FORM 4   PETITION FOR DRAINAGE WORKS BY DIRECTOR Drainage Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, Form 4. FORM 5   PETITION FOR DRAINAGE WORKS BY ENGINEER OR ROAD SUPERINTENDENT OR PERSON HAVING JURISDICTION OVER ROAD Drainage Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, Form 5. FORM 6   FORM OF BY-LAW Drainage Act    R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, Form 6. FORM 7   FORM OF BY-LAW Drainage Act    R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, Form 7. FORM 8   MUNICIPAL BY-LAWS Drainage Act   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, Form 8. FORM 9   NOTICE OF COMPENSATION PAID Drainage Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, Form 9. Français
content.raw_html:
5. The statement of the amount of compensation paid referred to in section 68 of the Act shall be in Form 9. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 274, s. 5.
